title: Pixel 4a camera crash all apps
content: For about 10 days, all applications trying to use the camera were crashing. These included camera app, viber, whatsup, facebook messenger, google duo that I purposedly tried. I followed all steps suggested including booting in safe mode and factory reset but had the same crash always. Just today as I was about to return the phone to seller, I disabled some features from developer settings for camera including Google Lens Suggestions, Framing hints, Video stabilization and Show dirty lens warning. Then opening the camera app was a success. After reenabling all 4 features the app keeps working correctly. I suspect this is a software bug, unfortunately as I was frustrated I didnt try to disable 1 feature at a time so as to be sure which was the culprit. Has anybody experience a similar issue?
